alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 29 at 10:22AM EST until January 30 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 14 to 18 inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southern New Hampshire and south central and southwest Maine. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and lead to power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of one to three inches per hour are expected. Also, the combination of heavy snow and blowing and drifting will lead to whiteout conditions at times.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..
